metadata.title: Establish organoid system with CRISPR perturbations

params.note: Used a human embryonic stem cell (hES cell) line expressing an enhanced specificity SpCas9 (eCas9) with a loxp stop element to reduce off-target effects.
Engineered a lentiviral vector to deliver 4-hydroxytamoxifen-inducible CRE recombinase and a dual single-guide RNA (sgRNA) cassette for eCas9 induction and CRISPR perturbations.
